ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.82"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10431)/@code="67523-1" Contraindications to thrombolytic use (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10432)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ExistenceOfContraindicationsToThrombolyticUse 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.41 STATIC (CONF:10433)
